metadata.title: CVE-2018-14681 on Ubuntu 22.10 (kinetic) - medium.
metadata.description:
An issue was discovered in kwajd_read_headers in mspack/kwajd.c in libmspack before 0.7alpha. Bad KWAJ file header extensions could cause a one or two byte overwrite.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2018-14681` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

libmspack0 - 0.7-1
No subscription required

notes.note: mdeslaur> clamav in xenial+ uses the system libmspack, trusty uses the embedded one.

criterions.comment: libmspack package in kinetic, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '0.7-1').
